dialog: SELF:All the stuff is gone now. There used to be a lot of stuff on it; it seemed to be used quite often.
SELF:There's a coffee-cup stain that cannot be rubbed off.
SELF:Poor guy. Looks like someone has finished moving his stuff out.
SELF:Quite a quaint little workspace. It looks empty.
SELF:With the small space, the guy could make it feel cozy and homey.
SELF:Instead, he went for the modern approach, and had the walls painted bland and sterile. Everything is chrome.
SELF:The only thing that pops out, as a result, is the conveniently-placed chair situated in the middle of the room.
SELF:I guess there's nothing more to see here.
SELF:Warning: about to leave this room. Are you sure you want to do this?
